verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after many days, that the word of the Lord came to Elijah in the third year, saying, Go, shew thyself unto Ahab; and I will send rain upon the earth.
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass after many days, that the word of the Lord came to Elijah in the third year, saying, Go, shew thyself unto Ahab; and I will send rain upon the earth.

verses.text_plain: And Elijah went to shew himself unto Ahab. And there was a sore famine in Samaria.
verses.verse_html: 2And Elijah went to shew himself unto Ahab. And there was a sore famine in Samaria.

verses.text_plain: And Ahab called Obadiah, which was the governor of his house. (Now Obadiah feared the Lord greatly:
verses.verse_html:
3And Ahab called Obadiah, which was the governor of his house. (Now Obadiah feared the Lord greatly: ▼
▼ Obadiah: Heb. Obadiahu
 , ▼
▼ the governor…: Heb. over his house

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Obadiah: Heb. Obadiahu
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Obadiah: Heb. Obadiahu

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the governor…: Heb. over his house
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the governor…: Heb. over his house

verses.text_plain: For it was so, when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the Lord, that Obadiah took an hundred prophets, and hid them by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water.)
verses.verse_html:
4For it was so, when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the Lord, that Obadiah took an hundred prophets, and hid them by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water.) ▼
▼ Jezebel: Heb. Izebel

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Jezebel: Heb. Izebel
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jezebel: Heb. Izebel

verses.text_plain: And Ahab said unto Obadiah, Go into the land, unto all fountains of water, and unto all brooks: peradventure we may find grass to save the horses and mules alive, that we lose not all the beasts.
verses.verse_html:
5And Ahab said unto Obadiah, Go into the land, unto all fountains of water, and unto all brooks: peradventure we may find grass to save the horses and mules alive, that we lose not all the beasts. ▼
▼ that…: Heb. that we cut not off ourselves from the beasts

footnotes.body_text: ▼ that…: Heb. that we cut not off ourselves from the beasts
footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: Heb. that we cut not off ourselves from the beasts

verses.text_plain: So they divided the land between them to pass throughout it: Ahab went one way by himself, and Obadiah went another way by himself.
verses.verse_html: 6So they divided the land between them to pass throughout it: Ahab went one way by himself, and Obadiah went another way by himself.

verses.text_plain: And as Obadiah was in the way, behold, Elijah met him: and he knew him, and fell on his face, and said, Art thou that my lord Elijah?
verses.verse_html: 7And as Obadiah was in the way, behold, Elijah met him: and he knew him, and fell on his face, and said, Art thou that my lord Elijah?

verses.text_plain: And he answered him, I am: go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here.
verses.verse_html: 8And he answered him, I am: go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here.

verses.text_plain: And he said, What have I sinned, that thou wouldest deliver thy servant into the hand of Ahab, to slay me?
verses.verse_html: 9And he said, What have I sinned, that thou wouldest deliver thy servant into the hand of Ahab, to slay me?

verses.text_plain: As the Lord thy God liveth, there is no nation or kingdom, whither my lord hath not sent to seek thee: and when they said, He is not there; he took an oath of the kingdom and nation, that they found thee not.
verses.verse_html: 10As the Lord thy God liveth, there is no nation or kingdom, whither my lord hath not sent to seek thee: and when they said, He is not there; he took an oath of the kingdom and nation, that they found thee not.

verses.text_plain: And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here.
verses.verse_html: 11And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, as soon as I am gone from thee, that the Spirit of the Lord shall carry thee whither I know not; and so when I come and tell Ahab, and he cannot find thee, he shall slay me: but I thy servant fear the Lord from my youth.
verses.verse_html: 12And it shall come to pass, as soon as I am gone from thee, that the Spirit of the Lord shall carry thee whither I know not; and so when I come and tell Ahab, and he cannot find thee, he shall slay me: but I thy servant fear the Lord from my youth.

verses.text_plain: Was it not told my lord what I did when Jezebel slew the prophets of the Lord, how I hid an hundred men of the Lord’s prophets by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water?
verses.verse_html: 13Was it not told my lord what I did when Jezebel slew the prophets of the Lord, how I hid an hundred men of the Lord’s prophets by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water?

verses.text_plain: And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here: and he shall slay me.
verses.verse_html: 14And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here: and he shall slay me.

verses.text_plain: And Elijah said, As the Lord of hosts liveth, before whom I stand, I will surely shew myself unto him to day.
verses.verse_html: 15And Elijah said, As the Lord of hosts liveth, before whom I stand, I will surely shew myself unto him to day.

verses.text_plain: So Obadiah went to meet Ahab, and told him: and Ahab went to meet Elijah.
verses.verse_html: 16So Obadiah went to meet Ahab, and told him: and Ahab went to meet Elijah.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when Ahab saw Elijah, that Ahab said unto him, Art thou he that troubleth Israel?
verses.verse_html: 17And it came to pass, when Ahab saw Elijah, that Ahab said unto him, Art thou he that troubleth Israel?

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when Ahab

verses.text_plain: And he answered, I have not troubled Israel; but thou, and thy father’s house, in that ye have forsaken the commandments of the Lord, and thou hast followed Baalim.
verses.verse_html: 18And he answered, I have not troubled Israel; but thou, and thy father’s house, in that ye have forsaken the commandments of the Lord, and thou hast followed Baalim.

verses.text_plain: Now therefore send, and gather to me all Israel unto mount Carmel, and the prophets of Baal four hundred and fifty, and the prophets of the groves four hundred, which eat at Jezebel’s table.
verses.verse_html: 19Now therefore send, and gather to me all Israel unto mount Carmel, and the prophets of Baal four hundred and fifty, and the prophets of the groves four hundred, which eat at Jezebel’s table.

verses.text_plain: So Ahab sent unto all the children of Israel, and gathered the prophets together unto mount Carmel.
verses.verse_html: 20So Ahab sent unto all the children of Israel, and gathered the prophets together unto mount Carmel.

verses.text_plain: And Elijah came unto all the people, and said, How long halt ye between two opinions? if the Lord be God, follow him: but if Baal, then follow him. And the people answered him not a word.
verses.verse_html:
21And Elijah came unto all the people, and said, How long halt ye between two opinions? if the Lord be God, follow him: but if Baal, then follow him. And the people answered him not a word. ▼
▼ opinions: or, thoughts

footnotes.body_text: ▼ opinions: or, thoughts
footnotes.body_html: ▼ opinions: or, thoughts

verses.text_plain: Then said Elijah unto the people, I, even I only, remain a prophet of the Lord; but Baal’s prophets are four hundred and fifty men.
verses.verse_html: 22Then said Elijah unto the people, I, even I only, remain a prophet of the Lord; but Baal’s prophets are four hundred and fifty men.

verses.text_plain: Let them therefore give us two bullocks; and let them choose one bullock for themselves, and cut it in pieces, and lay it on wood, and put no fire under: and I will dress the other bullock, and lay it on wood, and put no fire under:
verses.verse_html: 23Let them therefore give us two bullocks; and let them choose one bullock for themselves, and cut it in pieces, and lay it on wood, and put no fire under: and I will dress the other bullock, and lay it on wood, and put no fire under:

tokens.text: for themselves, and cut it in pieces

verses.text_plain: And call ye on the name of your gods, and I will call on the name of the Lord: and the God that answereth by fire, let him be God. And all the people answered and said, It is well spoken.
verses.verse_html:
24And call ye on the name of your gods, and I will call on the name of the Lord: and the God that answereth by fire, let him be God. And all the people answered and said, It is well spoken. ▼
▼ It is…: Heb. The word is good

footnotes.body_text: ▼ It is…: Heb. The word is good
footnotes.body_html: ▼ It is…: Heb. The word is good

verses.text_plain: And Elijah said unto the prophets of Baal, Choose you one bullock for yourselves, and dress it first; for ye are many; and call on the name of your gods, but put no fire under.
verses.verse_html: 25And Elijah said unto the prophets of Baal, Choose you one bullock for yourselves, and dress it first; for ye are many; and call on the name of your gods, but put no fire under.

verses.text_plain: And they took the bullock which was given them, and they dressed it, and called on the name of Baal from morning even until noon, saying, O Baal, hear us. But there was no voice, nor any that answered. And they leaped upon the altar which was made.
verses.verse_html:
26And they took the bullock which was given them, and they dressed it, and called on the name of Baal from morning even until noon, saying, O Baal, hear us. But there was no voice, nor any that answered. And they leaped upon the altar which was made. ▼
▼ hear: or, answer
 , ▼
▼ answered: or, heard
 , ▼
▼ leaped…: or, leaped up and down at the altar

footnotes.body_text: ▼ hear: or, answer
footnotes.body_html: ▼ hear: or, answer

footnotes.body_text: ▼ answered: or, heard
footnotes.body_html: ▼ answered: or, heard

footnotes.body_text: ▼ leaped…: or, leaped up and down at the altar
footnotes.body_html: ▼ leaped…: or, leaped up and down at the altar

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass at noon, that Elijah mocked them, and said, Cry aloud: for he is a god; either he is talking, or he is pursuing, or he is in a journey, or peradventure he sleepeth, and must be awaked.
verses.verse_html:
27And it came to pass at noon, that Elijah mocked them, and said, Cry aloud: for he is a god; either he is talking, or he is pursuing, or he is in a journey, or peradventure he sleepeth, and must be awaked. ▼
▼ aloud: Heb. with a great voice
 , ▼
▼ he is talking: or, he meditateth
 , ▼
▼ is pursuing: Heb. hath a pursuit

tokens.text: And it came to pass at noon
or he is in a journey

footnotes.body_text: ▼ aloud: Heb. with a great voice
footnotes.body_html: ▼ aloud: Heb. with a great voice

footnotes.body_text: ▼ he is talking: or, he meditateth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ he is talking: or, he meditateth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is pursuing: Heb. hath a pursuit
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is pursuing: Heb. hath a pursuit

verses.text_plain: And they cried aloud, and cut themselves after their manner with knives and lancets, till the blood gushed out upon them.
verses.verse_html:
28And they cried aloud, and cut themselves after their manner with knives and lancets, till the blood gushed out upon them. ▼
▼ the blood…: Heb. poured out blood upon them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the blood…: Heb. poured out blood upon them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the blood…: Heb. poured out blood upon them

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when midday was past, and they prophesied until the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that there was neither voice, nor any to answer, nor any that regarded.
verses.verse_html:
29And it came to pass, when midday was past, and they prophesied until the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that there was neither voice, nor any to answer, nor any that regarded. ▼
▼ offering: Heb. ascending
 , ▼
▼ that regarded: Heb. attention

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when midday

footnotes.body_text: ▼ offering: Heb. ascending
footnotes.body_html: ▼ offering: Heb. ascending

footnotes.body_text: ▼ that regarded: Heb. attention
footnotes.body_html: ▼ that regarded: Heb. attention

verses.text_plain: And Elijah said unto all the people, Come near unto me. And all the people came near unto him. And he repaired the altar of the Lord that was broken down.
verses.verse_html: 30And Elijah said unto all the people, Come near unto me. And all the people came near unto him. And he repaired the altar of the Lord that was broken down.

tokens.text: unto me. And all the people

verses.text_plain: And Elijah took twelve stones, according to the number of the tribes of the sons of Jacob, unto whom the word of the Lord came, saying, Israel shall be thy name:
verses.verse_html: 31And Elijah took twelve stones, according to the number of the tribes of the sons of Jacob, unto whom the word of the Lord came, saying, Israel shall be thy name:

verses.text_plain: And with the stones he built an altar in the name of the Lord: and he made a trench about the altar, as great as would contain two measures of seed.
verses.verse_html: 32And with the stones he built an altar in the name of the Lord: and he made a trench about the altar, as great as would contain two measures of seed.

verses.text_plain: And he put the wood in order, and cut the bullock in pieces, and laid him on the wood, and said, Fill four barrels with water, and pour it on the burnt sacrifice, and on the wood.
verses.verse_html: 33And he put the wood in order, and cut the bullock in pieces, and laid him on the wood, and said, Fill four barrels with water, and pour it on the burnt sacrifice, and on the wood.

verses.text_plain: And he said, Do it the second time. And they did it the second time. And he said, Do it the third time. And they did it the third time.
verses.verse_html: 34And he said, Do it the second time. And they did it the second time. And he said, Do it the third time. And they did it the third time.

verses.text_plain: And the water ran round about the altar; and he filled the trench also with water.
verses.verse_html:
35And the water ran round about the altar; and he filled the trench also with water. ▼
▼ ran: Heb. went

footnotes.body_text: ▼ ran: Heb. went
footnotes.body_html: ▼ ran: Heb. went

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass at the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that Elijah the prophet came near, and said, Lord God of Abraham, Isaac, and of Israel, let it be known this day that thou art God in Israel, and that I am thy servant, and that I have done all these things at thy word.
verses.verse_html: 36And it came to pass at the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that Elijah the prophet came near, and said, Lord God of Abraham, Isaac, and of Israel, let it be known this day that thou art God in Israel, and that I am thy servant, and that I have done all these things at thy word.

tokens.text: all these things at thy word

verses.text_plain: Hear me, O Lord, hear me, that this people may know that thou art the Lord God, and that thou hast turned their heart back again.
verses.verse_html: 37Hear me, O Lord, hear me, that this people may know that thou art the Lord God, and that thou hast turned their heart back again.

verses.text_plain: Then the fire of the Lord fell, and consumed the burnt sacrifice, and the wood, and the stones, and the dust, and licked up the water that was in the trench.
verses.verse_html: 38Then the fire of the Lord fell, and consumed the burnt sacrifice, and the wood, and the stones, and the dust, and licked up the water that was in the trench.

verses.text_plain: And when all the people saw it, they fell on their faces: and they said, The Lord, he is the God; the Lord, he is the God.
verses.verse_html: 39And when all the people saw it, they fell on their faces: and they said, The Lord, he is the God; the Lord, he is the God.

verses.text_plain: And Elijah said unto them, Take the prophets of Baal; let not one of them escape. And they took them: and Elijah brought them down to the brook Kishon, and slew them there.
verses.verse_html:
40And Elijah said unto them, Take the prophets of Baal; let not one of them escape. And they took them: and Elijah brought them down to the brook Kishon, and slew them there. ▼
▼ Take: or, Apprehend

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Take: or, Apprehend
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Take: or, Apprehend

verses.text_plain: And Elijah said unto Ahab, Get thee up, eat and drink; for there is a sound of abundance of rain.
verses.verse_html:
41And Elijah said unto Ahab, Get thee up, eat and drink; for there is a sound of abundance of rain. ▼
▼ a sound…: or, a sound of a noise of rain

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a sound…: or, a sound of a noise of rain
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a sound…: or, a sound of a noise of rain

verses.text_plain: So Ahab went up to eat and to drink. And Elijah went up to the top of Carmel; and he cast himself down upon the earth, and put his face between his knees,
verses.verse_html: 42So Ahab went up to eat and to drink. And Elijah went up to the top of Carmel; and he cast himself down upon the earth, and put his face between his knees,

verses.text_plain: And said to his servant, Go up now, look toward the sea. And he went up, and looked, and said, There is nothing. And he said, Go again seven times.
verses.verse_html: 43And said to his servant, Go up now, look toward the sea. And he went up, and looked, and said, There is nothing. And he said, Go again seven times.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass at the seventh time, that he said, Behold, there ariseth a little cloud out of the sea, like a man’s hand. And he said, Go up, say unto Ahab, Prepare thy chariot, and get thee down, that the rain stop thee not.
verses.verse_html:
44And it came to pass at the seventh time, that he said, Behold, there ariseth a little cloud out of the sea, like a man’s hand. And he said, Go up, say unto Ahab, Prepare thy chariot, and get thee down, that the rain stop thee not. ▼
▼ Prepare: Heb. Tie, or, Bind

tokens.text: And it came to pass at the seventh time

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Prepare: Heb. Tie, or, Bind
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Prepare: Heb. Tie, or, Bind

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass in the mean while, that the heaven was black with clouds and wind, and there was a great rain. And Ahab rode, and went to Jezreel.
verses.verse_html: 45And it came to pass in the mean while, that the heaven was black with clouds and wind, and there was a great rain. And Ahab rode, and went to Jezreel.

tokens.text: And it came to pass in the mean while

verses.text_plain: And the hand of the Lord was on Elijah; and he girded up his loins, and ran before Ahab to the entrance of Jezreel.
verses.verse_html:
46And the hand of the Lord was on Elijah; and he girded up his loins, and ran before Ahab to the entrance of Jezreel. ▼
▼ to the…: Heb. till thou come to Jezreel

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to the…: Heb. till thou come to Jezreel
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to the…: Heb. till thou come to Jezreel
